title: Installation issue: seacas
body:
I need to install seacas to provide ioss for our e4s environment. After concretizing as follows in our CENTOS7 image the build failed with the error output below. 

I then tried building it outside of our environment. The resulting spec and (different) error output are also below.

Note that we are building in a docker environment with a minimal OS install. Occasionally we run into packages that expect dependencies to be provided by the OS which aren't present here. I'm not sure if that's related to these errors, but something to keep in mind.

```
==> Concretized seacas
 -   uba3kiu  seacas@2019-08-20%gcc@7.3.0~adios2+applications build_type=RelWithDebInfo +cgns+fortran+legacy+matio~metis+mpi+shared~thread_safe+x11 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
 -   x6cobls      ^cgns@develop%gcc@7.3.0 build_type=RelWithDebInfo ~fortran+hdf5~int64+mpi+scoping arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
[+]  phicfpn          ^cmake@3.15.3%gcc@7.3.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
[+]  i6zkr74              ^ncurses@6.1%gcc@7.3.0~symlinks~termlib arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64

[+]  lcdvbej              ^mpich@3.2.1%gcc@7.3.0 device=ch3 +hydra netmod=tcp +pci pmi=pmi +romio~slurm~verbs~wrapperrpath arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
[+]  kkixm6p                  ^findutils@4.6.0%gcc@7.3.0 patches=84b916c0bf8c51b7e7b28417692f0ad3e7030d1f3c248ba77c42ede5c1c5d11e,bd9e4e5cc280f9753ae14956c4e4aa17fe7a210f55dd6c84aa60b12d106d47a2 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
[+]  5v7hnig                      ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@7.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64

[+]  nrotrbi                              ^libsigsegv@2.11%gcc@7.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
```
